original: intros Hneq Hstep Hfind. induction Hstep as [s_eq | l st mem to' msg' heap to'_in dom_in Coh_s S hooks_fire send_eq |]. - rewrite s_eq in Hfind. exists b. split. + apply Hfind. + intro b'. apply b'. - apply step_send_other in Hstep. specialize (Hstep m tm to b z). destruct Hstep as [b' [Hfind' Himpl]]. exists b'. split. + apply Hfind'. + apply Himpl.
